short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect requests for pastebin.com paste URLs to the raw text version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension looks for requests to http://pastebin.com/ and if the request is for a valid paste will automatically redirect the request to the raw version.  This is useful for users and developers who wish to just see the paste text without all the adverts, banner images, duplicate text and syntax highlighting.
